patthana23.12:4.1: Nakusalaṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.12:5.1: Nakusalaṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.12:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana23.12:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naappamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.12:6.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
